tool_description: Creates structured daily and weekly skincare routine schedules with optimal timing and product order based on selected products and personal preferences.

routine_complexity.description: Preferred routine complexity: minimal, moderate, comprehensive

error_messages: Invalid time allocation: Morning time must be 5-30 minutes, evening 10-45 minutes
Invalid complexity level: Use minimal, moderate, or comprehensive
Too many products: Maximum 8 morning products, 10 evening products
Empty product list: Must provide at least 1 product for each routine
Conflicting time/complexity: Comprehensive routines need more time than allocated
usage: List morning and evening products, optionally add weekly treatments, specify complexity preference and available time. Tool creates optimized routine schedule with proper product ordering.

morning_schedule.description: Ordered morning routine steps with timing

evening_schedule.description: Ordered evening routine steps with timing
